name: Slime Sewer Escape! [FREE]
description:
This game is more a prototype than anything. Feel free to let met know what you think! Check out my other stuff here: https://combosmooth.itch.io/

Controls (gamepad not enabled)

Left arrow = move left

Right arrow = move right

Up arrow = move up when climbing a wall

Down arrow = move down when climbing a wall

C + direction = sword attack

X + direction = gun attack

For debug purposes

R = restart game

+ (plus) on Num pad = increase slime charges

- (minus) on num pad = decrease slime charges

Z = Let’s you see collision boxes
